title: Google Cloud’s Nick Godfrey Talks Security, Budget and AI for CISOs

title: Prince Harry plays up NFL connection in his and Meghan Markle's new Sussex.com site
description: Harry and Meghan's new website has quite a number of changes. For instance, the site used to be titled SussexRoyal.com. The Duke and Duchess of Sussex likely dropped "royal" from their URL after agreeing to no longer use the word. The agreement came after they resigned from their position in the Royal Family in 2020.
